website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, high-end dress watch with cutting-edge functionality. We love the easy-to-read analog display, stark black dial, and super-accurate atomic timing system.
pros: Multifunction chronograph with radio sync for pinpoint accuracy
ECO drive technology eliminates need for batteries
cons: Hands and dial don't glow in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.  But not.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is pretty, but the bracelet is extremely uncomfortable. The hands are also highly polished and bare very difficult to quickly read the time. It does sync well to the AT signal and is beautiful. If it had better hands it would be great. But as is it cost to much, especially with the bracelet. If you get one, go ahead and order a leather band to wear it with. Oh yeah and the lug with is 23mm so good luck finding a new band. There aren’t many choices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box. OLD stock
customer_reviews.text: The watch I got was genuine, but defective. It would not charge even after hours in direct sunlight. I took it to an authorized Citizen dealer, who confirmed it wasn't working. A check of the serial number showed the watch I was shipped was at least 2, and probably 3, full release cycles old. I assume the supplier bought a lot of surplus inventory for pennies on the dollar from a bankrupt retailer. It's a good thing the return was free, including shipping. Definitely don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: a very nice addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch very much. I bought the 4010 titanium from another site as well and i believe I like this watch more. The fact it syncs with the atomic clock nightly is pretty cool. I live in a transmission dead spot, only 1 tv channel, no cell, and yet the watches both pick up the clock signal and sync. This watch looks to be slightly more sensitive than the other. The only down side I see is I seem to press the top button through normal motion on occasion putting the watch into stopwatch mode by accident, and the lack of a luminous dial. Beyond that it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great watch if you get a flawless one.
customer_reviews.text: While the watch has impressive specs, the quality control is terrible. The first watch I received wasn't new and the day hand was offset from the printed mark. The second watch I received looked new but the second hand has again a slight offset with the printed mark. That would be OK for a $15 watch, it's not for a $450 watch. Other than that the watch is beautiful. The radio sync does not work during the day in Boston, but it works perfectly at 2am (auto-sync) so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work so the time change feature is just great. Plus I like having a stop watch on hand (wrist) at all times, again this helps with my job. It also happens to look gorgeous so that's a plus too. The face is large without being gaudy and is clutter free unlike most other watches in its class; it only has dials for what you need and care about. The butterfly clasp sometimes comes halfway undone when you bend your wrist just right which is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is one of my favorites, very convenient to not have to worry about setting the time or date, it is always correct, overall it is well made for the price, the dual deployment clasp is a nice touch and the sapphire crystal is very nice to look at and have on a watch at this price point, sapphire is usually only used on high end watch brands like Rolex, Omega etc. so I was very pleased to have it on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for 300$
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very nice. Out the box it came out a little big. I had to get some links taken out. I really like how accurate this watch is. When I first got it. It was off by 1 minute but after it updated at 2 am it was synced with the exact time as my phone and it has stayed that way since my purchase. Reading the watch is easy there is no glare. Overall I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: When the watch arrived it looked beautiful. The picture does not show how beautiful this piece is. Its so much nicer in person. Received countless compliments. Great price. Looks better than ANY high end watch out there.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mer

customer_reviews.title: Watch band pins do not stay in place after band adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: The watch appears to be well made. It is a bit thicker than what I expected. When the watch band was adjusted the band pins would fall out and I had to use different pins to prevent reoccurrence of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Batalucco

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: A beautifully styled watch. You will receive numerous compliments on it. I do recommend you purchase an LED charger to use a night. It provides for charge updates and keeps the watch still as it updates from WWVB in Colorado.
customer_reviews.author: Show Me Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love my watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, like the radio controlled feature although I haven't been able to use that feature yet. No DX coming in from Fort Collins Colorado yet, hopefully this Fall. Absolutely beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dunkle

customer_reviews.title: Over all and excellent watch
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a quality analog watch that was had Solar and Atomic time setting features. This one fills the bill well. My only complaint and it is a minor one, is that it can be difficult to read in dim lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Harrington

customer_reviews.title: As soon as I got it the dial started spinning ...
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got it the dial started spinning and went to the correct time. Im a bigger fella and the 8.5 inch braclet fit without adjustment. Gave my Boliva to may grampa.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: You'll get complements
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watch! Watch the video to see how to set time, day, date and year. It's not intuitive, but you should only have to do it once. Nice feature to correct time each night by reading off a satellite.
customer_reviews.author: madisontom

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but can't see the hour and minute hands easily
customer_reviews.text: The watch dial and other details are nice, but the hour and minute hands don't stand out and are very difficult to see. Wish the hands were of a slightly different color. I had to return the watch unfortunately because of this design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is the second watch I bought with the same functions- solar charged, synced with the atomic clock, and has perpetual calendar. It is not as attractive as the other watch but there is no difficulty seeing the hands in any light.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bylund

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have illumination. Can't see anything in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Great look. Accurate in the 7-8 days since I have purchased. Can't see anything in the dark. Cheapest watches are illuminated.
customer_reviews.author: watchman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch, works out of the box. It is all set up and received the signal overnight and keeps accurate time ever since. Only wish it has reflective lighted hands and dial but that is a minor issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Precise, reliable, zero maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: What a great watch. I love the fact that it requires absolutely zero maintenance and it never skips a second, while showing date and day too.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch and Packaged Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch and was packaged perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Calcifer

customer_reviews.title: Hands don't glow in dark.
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell the time if you are in dark. my previous Citizen had it and I assumed it is a standard option.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Not original product
customer_reviews.text: The product was not original. It could be clearly identified in the packaging and also on the product itself . There was the manual and warranty missing . I returned the product as it was Fake. Don’t waste your money here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Great timepiece, very practical for daily wear, business or casual.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Peterson

customer_reviews.title: One of the best watch by the price
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent product. It's all that I need and it's so easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID ERNEST BAUMGARTNER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. Very comfortable to wear. Keeps excellent time. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: High quality time piece looks very classy and sophisticated!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved it! He said it was exactly what he wanted. We both agreed that It was nice and looked very classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, love the radio update and the eco drive
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch design and very attractive. The band is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cadman

customer_reviews.title: But still a beautiful time piece
customer_reviews.text: To thin 4 my wrist and hands. But still a beautiful time piece.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne May Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Easy watch to own. No constant setting. Like way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin J. Leavitt

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch, so far works well, the only problem l have, depending on the lightning, the time hands are hard to pick up,
customer_reviews.author: Debora Sapirstein

customer_reviews.title: can't say one way or the other as it was ...
customer_reviews.text: can't say one way or the other as it was bought as a gift to send to a friend that lives Fushun,China nuff said......
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: well made watch from citizen i really love the radio controlled watches all i have to do ...
customer_reviews.text: well made watch from citizen i really love the radio controlled watches all i have to do is choose my city the it will setup the timing by itself the timing is accurate and i don't have to worry about batteries because its Eco Drive it will recharge by any light source around you, it looks nice and modern and i cant stop staring at it.
customer_reviews.author: Hani Redha

customer_reviews.title: Classy poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch just over a year and it's needed repair twice already. Yes, there's a 5 year warranty, but dealing with it is not easy nor enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: BBits 5

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful /Elegant useful watch!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Eco Drive which means light charges the watch. Easy on and off clasp. Quick delivery and good instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Acarroll

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a present for a third party who has expressed complete satisfaction with the item.
customer_reviews.author: CeeDee

product_meta.title: Citizen Watches Mens AT8110-53E World Chronograph A-T
product_meta.description:
Watch Sizing Guide Citizen Eco-Drive™ FAQ Stake your claim on distinctive style with this chronograph watch from Citizen®. Part of the World Chronograph Collection. Eco-Drive never needs a battery. Stainless steel case and bracelet. Fold-over clasp closure with push-button release. Three-hand analog display with quartz movement,three sub-dials and date display window. Chronograph functionality. Dial includes silver-tone hands and hour markers. Water resistant. Citizen Watch offers a five-year limited manufacturer's warranty on all their products. For more information, please visit their website and see the "Service Information" section. Measurements: Case Height: 43 mm Case Width: 43 mm Case Depth: 10 mm Band Width: 22 6⁄7 mm Band Circumference/Length: 9 1⁄2 in Weight: 5.4 oz

 * Product Dimensions :4.72 x 4.72 x 4.72 inches; 2.43 Ounces
 * Item model number :AT8110-53E
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 CR2 batteries required.
 * Date First Available :June 16, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Citizen Watch Company
 * ASIN :B00YWJZ488

Water Resistant To 333 Feet. Rotate the crown counterclockwise until it releases from the case
